data: PED NEPH AMB Peritoneal Dialysis Unit to Collect Lab Orders qmonthly for 12 month (Day of Treatment)
For January and July, collect labs from the q6month Lab Work phase
May use Implanted Vascular Access Device
May use Peripherally Inserted Central Catheter
Use "Add to Phase" to add any required lab orders, with a frequency of "once"
